convert the ID from base64 to UUID and store it in newID
convert the ID format from 'base64' to 'JUUID' and store it in 'new_id'
remove "_" from the data keys and parse the ID

entry.value:
import json import sys import traceback import base64 import uuid from java.nio.charset import StandardCharsets from org.apache.commons.io import IOUtils from org.apache.nifi.processor.io import StreamCallback from org.python.core.util import StringUtil
def hex_to_base64(hex_string): base64_digits = "ABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZabcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz0123456789+/" base64 = "" group = 0 for i in range(0, 30, 6): group = int(hex_string[i:i+6], 16) base64 += base64_digits[(group >> 18) & 0x3f] base64 += base64_digits[(group >> 12) & 0x3f] base64 += base64_digits[(group >> 6) & 0x3f] base64 += base64_digits[group & 0x3f] group = int(hex_string[30:32], 16) base64 += base64_digits[(group >> 2) & 0x3f] base64 += base64_digits[(group << 4) & 0x3f] base64 += "==" return base64
def base64_to_hex(base64): base64_digits = "ABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZabcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz0123456789+/=" hex_digits = "0123456789abcdef" hex_string = "" i = 0 while i < 24: e1 = base64_digits.index(base64[i]) e2 = base64_digits.index(base64[i+1]) e3 = base64_digits.index(base64[i+2]) e4 = base64_digits.index(base64[i+3]) c1 = (e1 << 2) | (e2 >> 4) c2 = ((e2 & 15) << 4) | (e3 >> 2) c3 = ((e3 & 3) << 6) | e4 hex_string += hex_digits[c1 >> 4] hex_string += hex_digits[c1 & 15] if e3 != 64: hex_string += hex_digits[c2 >> 4] hex_string += hex_digits[c2 & 15] if e4 != 64: hex_string += hex_digits[c3 >> 4] hex_string += hex_digits[c3 & 15] i += 4 return hex_string
def to_juuid(bin_string): hex_string = base64_to_hex(bin_string) msb = hex_string[:16] lsb = hex_string[16:32] msb = msb[14:16] + msb[12:14] + msb[10:12] + msb[8:10] + msb[6:8] + msb[4:6] + msb[2:4] + msb[0:2] lsb = lsb[14:16] + lsb[12:14] + lsb[10:12] + lsb[8:10] + lsb[6:8] + lsb[4:6] + lsb[2:4] + lsb[0:2] hex_string = msb + lsb uuid = hex_string[:8] + '-' + hex_string[8:12] + '-' + hex_string[12:16] + '-' + hex_string[16:20] + '-' + hex_string[20:32] return uuid
class TransformCallback(StreamCallback): def __init__(self): pass
def process(self, inputStream, outputStream): try: input_text = IOUtils.toString(inputStream, StandardCharsets.UTF_8) input_obj = json.loads(input_text)
base64_id = input_obj.get('id') input_obj['new_id'] = to_juuid(base64_id)
output_obj = json.dumps(input_obj)
outputStream.write(bytearray(output_obj.encode('utf-8'))) except: traceback.print_exc(file=sys.stdout) raise
flowFile = session.get() if flowFile != None: flowFile = session.write(flowFile, TransformCallback())
session.transfer(flowFile, REL_SUCCESS)

import json import sys import traceback import base64 import uuid from java.nio.charset import StandardCharsets from org.apache.commons.io import IOUtils from org.apache.nifi.processor.io import StreamCallback from org.python.core.util import StringUtil
def hex_to_base64(hex_string): base64_digits = "ABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZabcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz0123456789+/" base64 = "" group = 0 for i in range(0, 30, 6): group = int(hex_string[i:i+6], 16) base64 += base64_digits[(group >> 18) & 0x3f] base64 += base64_digits[(group >> 12) & 0x3f] base64 += base64_digits[(group >> 6) & 0x3f] base64 += base64_digits[group & 0x3f] group = int(hex_string[30:32], 16) base64 += base64_digits[(group >> 2) & 0x3f] base64 += base64_digits[(group << 4) & 0x3f] base64 += "==" return base64
def base64_to_hex(base64): base64_digits = "ABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZabcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz0123456789+/=" hex_digits = "0123456789abcdef" hex_string = "" i = 0 while i < 24: e1 = base64_digits.index(base64[i]) e2 = base64_digits.index(base64[i+1]) e3 = base64_digits.index(base64[i+2]) e4 = base64_digits.index(base64[i+3]) c1 = (e1 << 2) | (e2 >> 4) c2 = ((e2 & 15) << 4) | (e3 >> 2) c3 = ((e3 & 3) << 6) | e4 hex_string += hex_digits[c1 >> 4] hex_string += hex_digits[c1 & 15] if e3 != 64: hex_string += hex_digits[c2 >> 4] hex_string += hex_digits[c2 & 15] if e4 != 64: hex_string += hex_digits[c3 >> 4] hex_string += hex_digits[c3 & 15] i += 4 return hex_string
def to_juuid(bin_string): hex_string = base64_to_hex(bin_string) msb = hex_string[:16] lsb = hex_string[16:32] msb = msb[14:16] + msb[12:14] + msb[10:12] + msb[8:10] + msb[6:8] + msb[4:6] + msb[2:4] + msb[0:2] lsb = lsb[14:16] + lsb[12:14] + lsb[10:12] + lsb[8:10] + lsb[6:8] + lsb[4:6] + lsb[2:4] + lsb[0:2] hex_string = msb + lsb uuid = hex_string[:8] + '-' + hex_string[8:12] + '-' + hex_string[12:16] + '-' + hex_string[16:20] + '-' + hex_string[20:32] return uuid
class TransformCallback(StreamCallback): def __init__(self): pass
def process(self, inputStream, outputStream): try: input_text = IOUtils.toString(inputStream, StandardCharsets.UTF_8) input_obj = json.loads(input_text)
base64_id = input_obj.get('id') input_obj['new_id'] = to_juuid(base64_id)
output_obj = json.dumps(input_obj)
outputStream.write(bytearray(output_obj.encode('utf-8'))) except: traceback.print_exc(file=sys.stdout) raise
flowFile = session.get() if flowFile != None: flowFile = session.write(flowFile, TransformCallback())
session.transfer(flowFile, REL_SUCCESS)
